title: We need OTA update for Pixels to enable VoLTE for Czech carriers.
content:
Update Pixels with VoLTE support for Czech carriers.
Stop ignoring other countries - it's year 2021. Market is open and many people travel.

And no, it's not a problem of carriers. There is a lot of instructions how to solve it (google it). Just few rows of code but normal user needs root which is not official method.
